title: Add AI generated voices to your work with Leelo AI, starting at only $50
content:
Macworld

A few short years ago, voice-generating software sounded like, well, software. The monotonous drone and lack of lifelike speech patterns made AI-generated voices sound as odd and fake as they actually were.

However, things have changed. Instead of just relying on the written word, Leelo AI users can use the platform’s exhaustive list of creative options to add seamless, lifelike audio to presentations, videos, social media posts, and more.

Leelo boasts over 800 different voices to choose from, including male, female, and even children’s voices to best suit your work. Voices can even be generated in over 140 languages to find your specific audience, all with appropriate accents and inflections. Your audio always feels authentic and impactful, whether you’re looking for a straight newscast-style read or one brimming with emotions like fear, joy, hope, and more.

Create and organize your audio files, save them to Leelo AI’s secure cloud storage space, and export them in various file formats to fit your specific platform. 

Elevate your content and other media with emotion-infused AI voices. Grab lifetime access to the Leelo AI Personal Plan for just $49.99. Need more words per month? Enjoy access to 80,000 words per month with lifetime access to the Leelo AI Pro Plan for just $79.99.
